## Description
Please include a summary of the change and which issue is fixed. Please also include relevant motivation and context.

Fixes # (issue)

## Type of change
Please delete options that are not relevant.

- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)
- [ ] New setup script or modification to existing scripts
- [ ] Dockerfile changes
- [ ] Documentation update

## How Has This Been Tested?
Please describe how you tested your changes. Include details of your testing environment and the tests you ran.

- [ ] Built the devcontainer image locally
- [ ] Tested with VS Code Remote Containers
- [ ] Verified all setup scripts run correctly
- [ ] Tested on the following platforms:
  - [ ] Linux (specify distribution)
  - [ ] macOS (specify version)
  - [ ] Windows (specify version)

## Security Considerations
- [ ] I have followed the security best practices outlined in [SECURITY.md](../SECURITY.md)
- [ ] This change does not introduce any new security vulnerabilities
- [ ] Dependencies added (if any) have been vetted for security issues

## Devcontainer Specific Checklist:
- [ ] Dockerfile changes follow best practices (specific versions, minimal layers, etc.)
- [ ] Setup scripts are executable and have proper error handling
- [ ] Scripts follow the naming convention: `XX-descriptive-name.sh`
- [ ] Changes maintain backward compatibility (or breaking changes are clearly documented)
- [ ] Image size has been kept as small as possible

## General Checklist:
- [ ] My code follows the style guidelines of this project
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] I have made corresponding changes to the documentation
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings
- [ ] I have tested my changes with a real devcontainer setup
- [ ] Any dependent changes have been merged and published

If applicable, add screenshots or examples to help explain your changes.
